thread.title: Here’s a Fresh Batch of Street Style From Copenhagen Fashion Week FW17
thread.title_full: Here’s a Fresh Batch of Street Style From Copenhagen Fashion Week FW17

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Here’s a Fresh Batch of Street Style From Copenhagen Fashion Week FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 15 images from this gallery. 
While most eyes will be looking to New York this week, Denmark’s most-stylish will also be out in force for Copenhagen Fashion Week FW17. Thankfully, Highsnobiety ‘s roaming lens is on-hand to capture what’s happening on the streets in both cities — meaning we won’t miss out on any of that Scandinavian sartorial genius.
In the first batch of street snaps seen above, you’ll spy the usual array of high-end/streetwear mashups, alongside more European-orientated brands like Helly Hansen and SEX Skateboards. It also appears the near-freezing temperatures in Copenhagen right now haven’t managed to knock the nonchalance of the city’s fashion elite — one guy even manages to rock a pair of Gucci slippers (slide 14.)
Check out the pics above, then head here for more fire street style.
In other fashion news, here’s every single piece from The Weeknd’s H&M “Spring Icons” selection.
